Far North one of best places to see Matariki star cluster this week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-one-of-best-place-to-see-matariki-star-cluster-this-week/ADGR5MOX75BUZEHKLFYU75QOVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-one-of-best-place-to-see-matariki-star-cluster-this-week/ADGR5MOX75BUZEHKLFYU75QOVA/ Mike DinsdaleMatariki star system visible from Far North this week Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The Far North is one of the best places in the country to see the Matariki star formation this week. The Matariki star system, also known as Pleiades, marks the Māori New Year and will be celebrated with a national holiday on Friday.

Wed, 26 Jun 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A large slip caused by recent rain on the Mangamuka State Highway 1 repairs won’t affect the planned reopening, which is still on track to be open before Christmas.
